doc.field: December Fana Media Corporation S.C. Fana Media Corporation S.C. (FMC) is a leading Ethiopian media organization formed through the merger of the former Fana Broadcasting Corporate S.C. (FBC) and Walta Media and Communication Corporate S.C. (WMCC). As a people-centered and influential media company FMC produces impactful news and programs that have attracted millions of viewers and listeners both within Ethiopia and internationally. Our diverse content is delivered through multiple platforms including Digital Media platforms Fana Television Fana Plus TV National Radio and FM stations such as Addis Ababa 98.1 Multilingual 105.3 Jimma 98.1 Gondar 98.1 Dessie 96.0 Haramaya 94.8 Shashemene 103.4 Wolaita Sodo 99.9 Nekemte 96.1 Debre Berhan 94.0 Asella 90.0 and Mizan Aman 92.5—making our broadcasts widely accessible and popular across the country and internationally. FMC is committed to contributing to Ethiopia’s economic social and political development by broadcasting in a range of languages including Amharic Afan Oromo Afar Somali Tigrigna Wolaita Sidamo Arabic and English. Beyond its compelling content FMC is also recognized for its leadership in media development training and consultancy services. We Reveal Ethiopia!
